payExecutor(address,uint256,uint256,uint.details: Gelato Executor risks:    - _getId does not match actual InstaMemory executor payment slot    - _token balance not in DSA    - worthless _token risk payable to be compatible in conjunction with DSA.cast payable target

params._amt: The amount of _token to pay the Gelato Executor.
params._getId: The InstaMemory slot at which the payment amount was stored.
params._setId: The InstaMemory slot to save the executor payout amound in.
params._token: The token used to pay the Executor.

payExecutor(address,uint256,uint256,uint.notice: Transfers automation gas fees to Gelato Executor

userdoc.notice: InstaDapp Connector to compensate Gelato Executors for automation-gas.
